name: free-games-claimer
description: Claims free games periodically on Epic Games Store, Amazon Prime Gaming and GOG

paths.name: FGC Data
paths.description: Persistent browser data and claim history.

ports.name: WebUI
ports.description: VNC web interface for viewing browser automation.

variables.name: Generic Email
variables.description: Generic email address for all platforms (if not specified individually).

variables.name: Generic Password
variables.description: Generic password for all platforms (if not specified individually).

variables.name: Epic Games Mail
variables.description: Epic Games Store account email address.

variables.name: Epic Games MFA OTP
variables.description: Epic Games two-factor authentication OTP secret key.

variables.name: Prime Gaming Mail
variables.description: Amazon Prime Gaming account email address.

variables.name: Prime Gaming MFA OTP
variables.description: Prime Gaming two-factor authentication OTP secret key.

variables.name: Prime Gaming Redeem on external store
variables.description: Automatically redeem claimed games to external stores (0=disabled, 1=enabled).
